s.text: Obligingly, Snow suggests six suitable matches for The Donald: a) Xena the Warrior Princess, b) Sabrina the Teenage Witch, c) Pamela Anderson Lee, d) Carmen Electra, e) Buffy the Vampire Slayer, and of course f) Dennis Rodman.

However, many pundits (such as Capital Gang 's Bob Novak and Al Hunt) think Bush's move was smart.

Appearing on Meet the Press and Late Edition , the current chairman of the Reform Party--Ross Perot ally Russell Verney--calls for Ventura to resign and says Perot has not yet ruled himself out of the presidential race.

On Face the Nation , Gary Bauer derides George W. Bush for "trying to get the Democratic nomination" by attacking "good Republican conservatives" on Capitol Hill.
